item.title: Chisto’s Cafe
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
Sorry for the lack of pictures folks, but yesterday I had lunch at the best sandwich/feel-good-food restaurant yesterday for lunch. Christo’s Cafe on Edgewater Drive has delicious comfort foods mixed in with delicious deli-style entrees. For example, yesterday I had a roast beef sandwich with corn fritters! Besides being delicious, I felt of so relaxed […]

The post Chisto’s Cafe appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
Sorry for the lack of pictures folks, but yesterday I had lunch at the best sandwich/feel-good-food restaurant yesterday for lunch. Christo’s Cafe on Edgewater Drive has delicious comfort foods mixed in with delicious deli-style entrees. For example, yesterday I had a roast beef sandwich with corn fritters! Besides being delicious, I felt of so relaxed and happy afterwords. What a great experience.

The post Chisto’s Cafe appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
